name: Johnnie Walker Black Label
description: A masterful blend of whiskies from across Scotland, aged for at least 12 years. Rich and complex with layers of flavor.

tastingNotes.nose: Rich fruits with hints of vanilla and orange peel
tastingNotes.palate: Creamy toffee, fruit, and smoky malt

name: Johnnie Walker Blue Label
description: An exquisite blend made from some of Scotland's rarest and most exceptional whiskies. Only one in every ten thousand casks has the quality to deliver the signature taste.

tastingNotes.nose: Dried fruits, hazelnuts, and sherry sweetness
tastingNotes.palate: Honey, dark chocolate, and a whisper of smoke
tastingNotes.finish: Velvety smooth with a lingering warmth

name: Johnnie Walker Gold Label Reserve
description: A celebration blend created from whiskies chosen specifically for their sweet, honeyed qualities. Luxuriously smooth with a gentle warmth.

tastingNotes.nose: Creamy vanilla, fresh fruits, and subtle wood notes
tastingNotes.palate: Honey, creamy toffee, and gentle wood spice
tastingNotes.finish: Sweet and lingering with a whisper of smoke

name: Talisker 10 Year Old
description: Made by the sea on the shores of the Isle of Skye. A powerful, peaty single malt with a maritime character that sets it apart.

tastingNotes.nose: Peat smoke, sea salt, and sweet malt
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with peppery smoke, dried fruit, and malt sweetness
tastingNotes.finish: Long, warm, and peppery with a smoky tail

name: Lagavulin 16 Year Old
description: The definitive Islay single malt. Intensely flavored yet beautifully balanced, with dry peat smoke that gives way to sweet, rich fruit.

tastingNotes.nose: Rich peat smoke with iodine and seaweed
tastingNotes.palate: Full, rich dried fruit sweetness and bold peat smoke
tastingNotes.finish: Immensely long, elegant peat with sweet notes

name: Oban 14 Year Old
description: From one of the smallest distilleries in Scotland, Oban offers a perfectly balanced single malt that bridges the Highland and Island styles.

tastingNotes.nose: Citrus and sea salt with a light smokiness
tastingNotes.palate: Rich, full and smooth with dried figs and honey
tastingNotes.finish: Long and exceptionally smooth with a dry, smoky sweetness

name: Roe & Co
description: A modern Dublin whiskey blended with care. Smooth, balanced, and perfect for mixing or sipping neat.

tastingNotes.nose: Vanilla, orchard fruits, and butterscotch
tastingNotes.palate: Spiced vanilla, creamy malt, and pear

name: Bulleit Bourbon
description: Frontier whiskey with a bold, spicy character and a clean, smooth finish. Made with a uniquely high rye content for its distinctive flavor.

tastingNotes.nose: Oak, nutmeg, and light toffee
tastingNotes.palate: Maple, oak, and a spicy rye bite

name: Ketel One Vodka
description: Crafted in the Netherlands using traditional copper pot stills combined with modern distilling techniques. Exceptionally smooth with a crisp finish.

tastingNotes.nose: Fresh and clean with citrus notes
tastingNotes.palate: Crisp and silky with a hint of honey

name: Smirnoff No. 21 Vodka
description: The world's number one vodka. Triple distilled and ten times filtered for a smooth, clean taste that works perfectly in any cocktail.

tastingNotes.nose: Clean with a light grain character
tastingNotes.palate: Smooth and mild with a hint of sweetness

name: Ciroc Vodka
description: A luxurious vodka distilled from fine French grapes. Five times distilled for a remarkably fresh and smooth taste.

tastingNotes.nose: Fresh citrus with subtle floral notes
tastingNotes.palate: Smooth and luscious with a hint of grape

name: Tanqueray London Dry Gin
description: A perfectly balanced gin using four botanicals. Crisp and refreshing with a distinctive juniper character that has made it a bartender's favorite since 1830.

tastingNotes.nose: Juniper, citrus, and subtle spice
tastingNotes.palate: Clean, crisp juniper with refreshing citrus

name: Tanqueray No. Ten
description: A small-batch gin crafted with fresh whole citrus fruits in a unique Tiny Ten still. Beautifully crafted for the perfect martini.

tastingNotes.nose: Fresh grapefruit, orange, and lime
tastingNotes.palate: Citrus-forward with chamomile and white pepper

name: Gordon's London Dry Gin
description: The world's best-selling London Dry Gin. A carefully crafted recipe of juniper berries and other botanicals, unchanged since 1769.

tastingNotes.nose: Fresh juniper with hints of coriander
tastingNotes.palate: Bold juniper with a touch of citrus

name: Don Julio Blanco
description: The purest expression of blue agave. Unaged and crystal clear with a fresh, agave-forward character that makes it perfect for cocktails.

tastingNotes.nose: Fresh agave, citrus, and light pepper
tastingNotes.palate: Clean agave with notes of citrus and black pepper

name: Don Julio Reposado
description: Aged for eight months in American white oak barrels, creating a mellow, elegant tequila with a rich and smooth flavor.

tastingNotes.nose: Dark chocolate, caramel, and ripe banana
tastingNotes.palate: Smooth agave with vanilla, cinnamon, and toasted oak
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, with a pleasant lingering agave sweetness

name: Don Julio 1942
description: A tribute to the year Don Julio began his tequila-making journey. Aged for a minimum of two and a half years for an exceptionally smooth, complex spirit.

tastingNotes.nose: Caramel, toffee, and warm oak with vanilla
tastingNotes.palate: Rich butterscotch, chocolate, and roasted agave

name: Casamigos Blanco
description: A crisp, clean tequila with hints of citrus and a smooth, slightly sweet finish. Rested for two months for a silky character.

tastingNotes.nose: Citrus, vanilla, and sweet agave
tastingNotes.palate: Smooth agave with hints of mint and a slight sweetness

name: Captain Morgan Original Spiced Gold
description: A spirit drink based on Caribbean rum blended with a secret mix of spices. Smooth and medium-bodied, perfect for mixing.

tastingNotes.nose: Vanilla, brown sugar, and warm spices
tastingNotes.palate: Sweet vanilla with caramel and subtle spice
tastingNotes.finish: Smooth and mellow with a warm spice finish

name: Ron Zacapa Centenario 23
description: A Guatemalan rum aged between 6 and 23 years using the Sistema Solera process. Rich, complex, and remarkably smooth.

tastingNotes.nose: Rich butterscotch, oak, and dried fruits
tastingNotes.palate: Honeyed caramel, dark chocolate, and spiced oak

name: Guinness Draught
description: The iconic Irish dry stout, famous for its velvety texture and creamy head. Brewed at St. James's Gate since 1759.

tastingNotes.nose: Roasted barley and coffee with a touch of caramel
tastingNotes.palate: Smooth and creamy with roasted malt and subtle bitterness

name: Guinness Foreign Extra Stout
description: A bold, full-flavored stout with more hops and higher ABV than Guinness Draught. Originally brewed for export, now enjoyed worldwide.

tastingNotes.nose: Roasted grain, dried fruit, and a hint of tartness
tastingNotes.palate: Rich roasted barley with fruity notes and firm bitterness

name: The Singleton of Dufftown 12
description: An approachable and fruity Speyside single malt aged for 12 years. Smooth and sweet, perfect for those new to single malts.

tastingNotes.nose: Ripe pear, toffee, and nutmeg
tastingNotes.palate: Smooth butterscotch, nutty flavors, and ripe fruit
tastingNotes.finish: Medium length, sweet, and pleasantly malty

name: Buchanan's DeLuxe 12
description: A smooth, well-balanced blended Scotch whisky aged for 12 years. Known for its sophisticated, fruity character.

tastingNotes.nose: Citrus, honey, and a touch of oak
tastingNotes.palate: Smooth and fruity with toffee and vanilla

name: Baileys Original Irish Cream
description: The original Irish cream liqueur, blending Irish whiskey with cream, cocoa, and vanilla. Indulgently smooth and versatile.

tastingNotes.nose: Cream, chocolate, and vanilla
tastingNotes.palate: Rich cream, cocoa, and a hint of caramel
